title: Siege Battles, Diplomacy, & More!  - Veil of Crows Early Access Gameplay
description:
Epic New Adventure Begins: Battles & More - Veil of Crows Early Access Gameplay - Hey guys!  Today we are playing a new early access game called Veil of Crows. Some call it a mix of Total War and Mount and blade. I have only played about an hour of the games so I am not a pro by any means.  But hopefully this video will so you the basics of the games. In this video we will start a new campaign and then a massive siege battle.  Enjoy the video :D

****You can support my channel now by buying a game from White Tie Games using this link: https://www.whitetiegames.com/affiliates/ref?pr=cd4380&type=main

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
